title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Meanwhile, fry the pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and Parmesan cheese together.
Drain the spaghetti, then mix immediately with the pancetta.
Quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, ensuring the pasta is coated evenly.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for at least 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
In a pan, heat oil and add tomato puree. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add heavy cream and stir until smooth.
Mix in the grilled chicken and cook for another 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan bread or rice.
